title: Installation issue of ruby-packages
body:
I am trying to create the recipe of glib2 which depends on native-package-installer and pkg-config.
Glib2, native-package-installer and pkg-config are the ruby packages.
When I install glib2 with my recipe, I get an error "cannot load such file -- pkg-config (LoadError)."
What should I do with this in this case?

The following is detailed information.

glib2: https://rubygems.org/gems/glib2
native-package-installer : https://rubygems.org/gems/native-package-installer
pkg-config : https://rubygems.org/gems/pkg-config

The error message is as follows.
It seems that the ruby that installed by spack can find the pkg-config.
However, ruby can not load the pkg-config when I install the glib2 by spack.

```
/spack/ihara/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-a64fx/gcc-8.3.1/ruby-2.7.1-sevf3kxjmb7qiyywlhioqjfsgkjznp7w/lib/ruby/2.7.0/rubygems/core_ext/kernel_require.rb:92:in `require': cannot load such file -- pkg-config (LoadError)
        from /spack/ihara/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-a64fx/gcc-8.3.1/ruby-2.7.1-sevf3kxjmb7qiyywlhioqjfsgkjznp7w/lib/ruby/2.7.0/rubygems/core_ext/kernel_require.rb:92:in `require'
        from /spack/ihara/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-a64fx/gcc-8.3.1/ruby-glib2-3.4.3-wh2rwfxpp7r4oazglfwdrspt3qdvn2ks/gems/glib2-3.4.3/lib/mkmf-gnome.rb:19:in `<top (required)>'
        from /spack/ihara/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-a64fx/gcc-8.3.1/ruby-2.7.1-sevf3kxjmb7qiyywlhioqjfsgkjznp7w/lib/ruby/2.7.0/rubygems/core_ext/kernel_require.rb:92:in `require'
        from /spack/ihara/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-a64fx/gcc-8.3.1/ruby-2.7.1-sevf3kxjmb7qiyywlhioqjfsgkjznp7w/lib/ruby/2.7.0/rubygems/core_ext/kernel_require.rb:92:in `require'
        from extconf.rb:27:in `<main>'
```
I run "gem environment gempath" command on install method on recipes of glib2, then I can get a path of pkg-config.


```
==> [2020-12-28-12:01:15.850345] '/spack/ihara/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-a64fx/gcc-8.3.1/ruby-2.7.1-sevf3kxjmb7qiyywlhioqjfsgkjznp7w/bin/gem' 'environment' 'gempath'
/spack/ihara/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-a64fx/gcc-8.3.1/ruby-glib2-3.4.3-wh2rwfxpp7r4oazglfwdrspt3qdvn2ks:/spack/ihara/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-a64fx/gcc-8.3.1/ruby-native-package-installer-1.0.9-mthicv2khskl4sc77tzkb7lea6f2zqw3:/spack/ihara/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-a64fx/gcc-8.3.1/ruby-pkg-config-1.4.4-r7w56kv7ctvwsqnytpmtlhgkzx4vs3ym
```

I also can get a pkg-config with "gem list".

```
==> [2020-12-28-12:01:16.177351] '/spack/ihara/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel8-a64fx/gcc-8.3.1/ruby-2.7.1-sevf3kxjmb7qiyywlhioqjfsgkjznp7w/bin/gem' 'list'
benchmark (default: 0.1.0)
bigdecimal (default: 2.0.0)

・・・

pkg-config (1.4.4)
```
Could you give me some advice on how to deal with this issue?
